definitions: the action of degrading someone to the status of a mere object

examples.text: the objectification of women in popular entertainment

shortDefinitions: action of degrading someone to status of mere object

definitions: the expression of something abstract in a concrete form

examples.text: the objectification of images may be astonishingly vivid in dreams
the church says that we are the visible objectifications of sin

shortDefinitions: expression of something abstract in concrete form
